toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.
settingToggleExpertModeBodyDescription:
Expert mode turns off the confirm transaction prompt and allows high slippage trades that often result
                in bad rates and lost funds.
settingToggleExpertModeBodyPrompt: ONLY USE THIS MODE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
please-type-the-word-confirm-to-enable-e: Please type the word "confirm" to enable expert mode.
bypasses-confirmation-modals-and-allows-: Bypasses confirmation modals and allows high slippage trades. Use at your own risk.
your-transaction-will-revert-if-the-pric: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
your-transaction-will-revert-if-it-is-pe: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this long.
enter-an-address-to-trigger-a-best-claim:
Enter an address to trigger a BEST claim. If the address has any claimable BEST it will be sent to them on
              submission.
confirm-this-transaction-in-your-wallet: Confirm this transaction in your wallet
output-is-estimated-if-the-price-changes: Output is estimated. If the price changes by more than {{ percentage }}% your transaction will revert.
